parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240014) at the bottom. This strongly suggests it is electoral propaganda material.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly refers to Sorin Cristian Alic, a candidate for senator with the AUR party.  The image prominently features Alic and other AUR members. The text "VOTEAZĂ AUR!" (Vote AUR!) directly advocates for his election. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, this content is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. The use of Facebook as a platform further supports this. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support Sorin Cristian Alic and the AUR party. The call to action "VOTEAZĂ AUR!" and the visual representation of Alic and his party members leave no doubt about this intention. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks any objective reporting or analysis. Instead, it directly promotes a candidate and party, lacking the neutrality expected of journalistic content.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clear and direct appeal for votes, presented as an advertisement.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>615181904175327</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers directly to a candidate (Sorin Cristian Alic), is used during the electoral campaign period (although the end date is given as after the election, the image and text clearly indicate it was published before), has a clear electoral objective (to garner votes for Alic and AUR), and goes beyond simple journalistic reporting. The presence of a CMF number further reinforces this classification.  The paid nature of the Facebook post and its wide reach solidify its status as electoral propaganda.  The fact that the end date is given as after the election is problematic, as it suggests the post may have remained active after the legal campaign period ended.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate>
    <name>Sorin Cristian Alic</name>
    <impact>POSITIVE</impact>
  </candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>AUR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
RLX Vision Digital SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 615181904175327) cu conținut de propagandă electorală, care promovează candidatul Sorin Cristian Alic (AUR) pentru funcția de senator. Postarea, realizată la comanda Partidului Alianța pentru Unirea Românilor, conține imagini cu candidatul și membri ai partidului, însoțite de îndemnul explicit „VOTEAZĂ AUR!”, având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea acestuia.  Prezența numărului CMF 11240014 confirmă natura de material electoral.  Postarea, cu o cheltuială de sub 100 RON, a generat între 3000 și 4000 de impresii, ajungând la o estimare de 100.000-500.000 de persoane, conform datelor din Ad Library.  Informațiile de contact ale advertiserului sunt disponibile: sorin.alic@yahoo.com și +40722501049.  Chiar dacă data de încheiere a campaniei este menționată după data alegerilor, contextul vizual și textual al postării indică clar că aceasta a fost publicată înainte de încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
